tool_description: Identifies and analyzes price discrepancies across different sales channels for the same products, flagging conflicts that require resolution.

product_id.description: Product SKU or ID to analyze for conflicts

channel_prices.description: Array of prices from different channels

channel_identifiers.description: Names of channels corresponding to prices

tolerance_percentage.description: Acceptable price variance percentage before flagging conflict

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: channel_prices and channel_identifiers must have the same length.
Invalid tolerance: tolerance_percentage must be between 0 and 100.
Insufficient data: Need at least 2 channels to detect conflicts.
usage: Provide product_id, channel_prices, and channel_identifiers arrays. Set tolerance_percentage to define acceptable price variance.
